# Argaman.co — Services & Pricing (machine-readable)

Language: Hebrew/English mixed (prices in ILS).
Currency: ILS (₪).

## Services
- Event photography (stills)
- Event video (as add-on)
- On-site printed photo magnets
- Balloons / photo corner design
- Photo booth (selfie station)
- Catering (availability depends on venue)

## Packages

### Brit Mila (ברית מילה)

Package: חבילת צילום לברית (פופולרית)
- Price: ₪1500
- Includes:
  - Unlimited stills during the event
  - Unlimited magnets (7.5x10)
  - Video of the brit ceremony
  - 6 large magnets (15x20)
  - 4 wood blocks
  - Link to photo gallery

Package: חבילה משולבת (מומלץ ביותר) – ברית מילה
- Price: ₪2500
- Includes:
  - All items in the photography package above
  - Balloon wall ~3.5m + colors + props (photo corner)

## Notes / Constraints
- Magnets require a table and an electrical outlet.
- Balloons require time for setup and an electrical outlet (inflation).
- Outdoor balloon walls depend on wind/conditions.

## Contact
Website: https://argaman.co
